images
.
<img src="http://example.com">
.
<img src="http://example.com" alt="" title="">
.

.
<img src="https://example.com">
.
<img src="https://example.com" alt="" title="">
.

.
<img src="//example.com">
.
<img src="//example.com" alt="" title="">
.

.
<img src="example.com">
.
<img src="http://example.com" alt="" title="">
.

.
<img src="ftp://example.com">
.
&lt;img src=&quot;ftp://example.com&quot;&gt;
.

.
<img src="hhttp://example.com">
.
&lt;img src=&quot;hhttp://example.com&quot;&gt;
.

.
<img src="/example.com">
.
&lt;img src=&quot;/example.com&quot;&gt;
.

.
<img src="javascript://example.com">
.
&lt;img src=&quot;javascript://example.com&quot;&gt;
.

.
<img src="javascript:example.com">
.
&lt;img src=&quot;javascript:example.com&quot;&gt;
.



links
.
<a href="http://example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="http://example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="https://example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="https://example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="//example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="//example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="http://example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="ftp://example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="ftp://example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="mailto:user@example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="mailto:user@example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="xmpp:user@example.com">text</a>
.
<p><a href="xmpp:user@example.com" title="" target="_blank">text</a></p>
.

.
<a href="/example.com">text</a>
.
<p>&lt;a href=&quot;/example.com&quot;&gt;text&lt;/a&gt;</p>
.

.
<a href="javascript://example.com">text</a>
.
<p>&lt;a href=&quot;javascript://example.com&quot;&gt;text&lt;/a&gt;</p>
.

.
<a href="javascript:example.com">text</a>
.
<p>&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:example.com&quot;&gt;text&lt;/a&gt;</p>
.

.
<a href="data:example.com">text</a>
.
<p>&lt;a href=&quot;data:example.com&quot;&gt;text&lt;/a&gt;</p>
.
